Package src.controller

Class GuestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.controller.GuestManager
  • public class GuestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    GuestManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - HotelAppView and GuestView and the model class - Guest.

    It can initialize, create, update or search Guest details.

    Since:
    2022-04-05

        public static void createGuest​(java.lang.String firstName,
                               java.lang.String lastName,
                               java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                               java.lang.String address,
                               Gender gender,
                               Identity identity,
                               java.lang.String nationality,
                               java.lang.String contactNo)
        Constructor for the guest in the GuestManager

        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the guest
        lastName - the last name of the guest
        creditCardNumber - the credit card number of the guest
        address - the address of the guest
        gender - the gender of the guest
        identity - the identity of the guest
        nationality - the nationality of the guest
        contactNo - the contact number of the guest

      • updateGuest

        public static boolean updateGuest​(java.lang.String guestId,
                                  int attributeCode,
                                  java.lang.String newValue)
        The function to update the detail of the guest and save the file into database

        Parameters:
        guestId - the guest id of the guest
        attributeCode - the attribute code for the detail that user choose to update
        newValue - the new detail value for the guest
        Returns:
        true if updating of guest is successful. Otherwise, false if the guest id is not found.

      • updateGuest

        public static boolean updateGuest​(java.lang.String guestId,
                                  int attributeCode,
                                  java.lang.String newValue1,
                                  java.lang.String newValue2)
        Overloading method of updateGuest that update the first name and last name of the guest

        Parameters:
        guestId - the guest id of the guest
        attributeCode - the attribute code for the detail that user choose to update
        newValue1 - the new value for the first name
        newValue2 - the new value for the last name
        Returns:
        true if updating of guest is successful. Otherwise, false if the guest id is not found.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • removeGuest

        public static boolean removeGuest​(java.lang.String guestId)
        Function to remove guest from the database

        Parameters:
        guestId - the guest id of the guest that the user want to remove
        Returns:
        true if remove successfully. Otherwise, false if guest id is not found

      • printAllGuests

        public static void printAllGuests​(boolean byId)
        Function to print all guest in the database that show the guest id and the Guest

        See Guest.toString() for the printing format of guest

        Parameters:
        byId - true if print by id. Otherwise, false if print by guest name.

      • validateGuestId

        public static boolean validateGuestId​(java.lang.String guestId)
        validate if the database has this guest according to guest id

        Parameters:
        guestId - the guest of the guest that you want to validate
        Returns:
        true if guest id exist. Otherwise, false if guest id does not exist

      • findGuestDetails

        public static boolean findGuestDetails​(java.lang.String keyword,
                                       boolean byId)
        Function to print guest details given a particular guest id

        Parameters:
        keyword - keyword to find guest, can be guest id or substring of guest name
        byId - true if find by guest id. Otherwise, false if find by guest name.
        Returns:
        true if guest id exist. Otherwise, false if guest id does not exist
